amendment.description: Amendment prohibits individuals from sitting on the Board if they are currently receiving EPA contracts or grants and would conditionally prohibit them from being allowed to apply for any EPA contracts or grants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 2 printed in Part A of House Report 114-37 to prohibit an individual from sitting on the Board if they are currently receiving EPA contracts or grants and would then prohibit them from being allowed to apply for, 3 years after serving as a Board member, for any EPA contracts or grants.
